rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Ely Wor Hyd Pet Evm Wcb Alb2 Cdm Mch

res.rBody:
Plange quasi virgo plebs mea ululate pastores in cinere et cilicio
quia veniet dies domini quia venient dies domini magna et amara valde

verses.vBody:
Accingite vos sacerdotes
et plangite ministri altaris et plangite ministri altaris aspergite vos cinere et dicite ministri altaris aspergite vos cinere
Plauserunt super te manibus Plauserunt super me manibus Plauserunt super me manibus suis omnes transeuntes per viam sibilaverunt et moverunt caput

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S Ely Wor Hyd Pet Alb2 Cdm

verses.vBody: Ululate pastores et clamate aspergite vos cinere

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Ely Wor Hyd Pet Evm Wcb Alb2 Cdm Mch
